Text:
Plays awfully bad on VLC, (choppy gray screen flickering thrue the entire movie), Dosent play at all with Quick-time, and with Realplayer, the movie is just choppy and laggy, 

Honestly, at least post a movie in a GOOD format, not some crummy MP4 format.
this movie plays perfectly on my end just fine. I don't know whats wrong with your vlc player n all the other ones but, this is good quality don't download my torrents if you don't like
